text: Ngoko ke xa niqubisana nabo bangakholwayo (edabini) bageceni iintamo zabo nide nibathuthumbise ngokubabulala, emva koko nigcine abathinjwa babo nize ukuba niyathanda nibenzele inceba okanye nibakhulule ngentlawuliso de imfazwe yothule imigodlo yayo1. Lowo (ngumyalelo ka- Allâh). Kananjalo ukuba uAllâh Ebethandile ngezithabathele impindezelo ngokwaKhe kodwa Uye (Wayalela umzabalazo wezixhobo) ukuvavanya abanye ngabanye. Kananjalo abo babulewe eNdleleni ka-Allâh
